document_data.mainbody:
'''Sherry''' was a commonly consumed type of fortified [[wine]], similar to [[brandy]], found throughout the [[Realms]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20230710040054/http://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_101112-06.htm| title = So Saith Ed Oct – Dec 2006| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
{{quote|''You want us to practice drinking tripleshroom sherry until we can drain a bottle without showing it? Phuingara, we'll die. I mean it; that stuff burns the insides like fire!''|[[Cilivren Doedance]] of [[Myth Drannor]]}}
document_data.Varieties:
*[[Amberheart sherry]], a variety found in the Forest Kingdom of [[Cormyr]].
*[[Amberjack]], the sherry created by [[Gyudd's Distillery]] of [[Skullport]].
*[[Dragonfire (sherry)|Dragonfire]], a deep amber-colored sherry from [[Zazesspur]].
*[[Myrin sherry]], a drink flavored with [[raspberries]] and [[cranberries]] from [[Myrinjar]] in the [[Border Kingdoms]].{{Cite polyhedron/135/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms|8}}
*[[Portal Sherry]], a potent libation from the [[Western Heartlands]].
*[[Tripleshroom sherry]], a sherry made of [[fungus]], roaringly popular in ancient [[Myth Drannor]].
*[[Zzar]], a popular [[Waterdhavian]] sherry.
document_data.Availability:
*[[Feldepost's Inn]] in [[Beregost]] served an especially excellent sherry to its guests from the depths of the inn's wine cellar.
*[[The Old Plough]], the only tavern in the village of [[Cragmyr]] in [[Amn]], served sherry to its guests.{{Cite dragon/200/Elminster's Notebook: Lord Kuldak Maurancz|144}} In [[Waymoot]], sherry priced at 3,500 [[gp]] was served at [[The Silver Wink]] tavern.
*[[The Battlescarred Bard]] inn on the [[Trade Way]] in Amn offered a good selection to its guests, including quality sherries. Another tavern on the Trade Way, [[The Fast Sails]] of [[Tulmene]] was known to carry sherry.
*The [[Dashalam Winery]] of [[Tulmon]] in the [[Land of the Lions]] was the maker of the town's quality wines and sherries.
*Sherry could also be found served in [[The Yardarm]] and [[Morgan's Inn]] in [[Velen]] on the [[Dragon's Head Peninsula]] of [[Tethyr]].
*Sherry was available for purchase in [[Archenbridge]]'s [[The Bridge and Bow]] tavern, [[The Silver Taproom]] in [[Essembra]], and [[The Oak and Spear]] of [[Highmoon]].
